stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  outerMax  and  innerMax  are properly declared and initialized  int  variables that are greater than or equal to zero.

 

for (int outer = 0; outer < outerMax; outer++)
{
   for (int inner = 0; inner < innerMax; inner++)
   { 
      System.out.println("*");
   }
}

choicesHtml: It prints  "*"  a total of  outerMax + innerMax  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  outerMax * innerMax  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  (outerMax + 1) + (innerMax + 1)  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  (outerMax + 1) * (innerMax + 1)  times.
